title: 41 Best Gifts for Mom That She’ll Actually Appreciate 2025
description: Whether she’s a foodie or fashionista, we found top-tier gifts she won’t have to pretend to love
author: Sarah Madaus, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Looking for the best gifts for moms? Get inspired with these thoughtful presents, including designer accessories, unique decor, self-care essentials, and more.
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.The best gifts for moms all have one thing in common: The thought behind them. Whether the present you land on is a piece of jewelry, a sweet treat, or a household essential that she’ll use day in and day out, the main thing is to pick something that speaks to what you know and love about her. Maybe the resident baker-in-chief could use a new recipe stand for pouring over ingredients or the hardcore yogi could use a new mat. Dig deep in the memory bank and you’ll undoubtedly think up something great, but if you’re looking for a little immediate inspiration, we’ve got you covered. And while you still have time to prep for Mother’s Day, we’d suggest not waiting until the very last minute to go in with the sibling group chat on something nice (a word of advice your always-prepared mom would pass on, too).On that note, we’ve rounded up the best Mother's Day gifts for all the mother figures out there, including designer bouquets, quirky home goods, DIY moments, wellness must-haves for an at-home day of pampering, and more. Read on for our best gifts for moms.Our Top Picks:For The Art-Loving Cook: Brightland Paint & Pour Gift Set, $95For The Stylish Plant Mom: The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee Meintjes, $20For The Sleepmaxxer: Sijo Eucalyptus Comforter, $235 $200For The Gadget-Lover: Hatch Restore 3, $170For The Spa Enthusiast: Brooklinen Super-Plush Bath Towel Bundle, $150For The Caffeine Aficionado: Atlas Coffee Club Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift Set, $120 $99Brightland Paint & Pour Gift Set1/41Brightland Paint & Pour Gift SetNo gift guide for moms would be complete without a few cooking essentials. This set puts a fun spin on Brightland’s coveted extra virgin olive oil with a paint kit that lets you customize your own labels. We suggest making a night out of it, complete with some wine and your favorite sourdough to pair with the olive oil.The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee Meintjes2/41The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee MeintjesPairing this beautiful print from artist Laura Le Meintjes with a stunning bouquet is the ultimate gift idea for moms who love florals. And while the real florals won’t last, she’ll be able to admire the artwork for years to come.Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus Comforter3/41Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus ComforterFinally, a comforter for hot sleepers that truly checks every box: Lightly weighted but breathable, warm but moisture-wicking. Though, if mom prefers a light through, SIJO’s lighter throw blanket is sustainably made from the same 100% Tencel lyocell.Hatch Restore 3Gift mom her best sleep yet with the Hatch Restore 3 (you’ll remember the Hatch Restore 2 snagged a spot in our 2024 Sleep Awards). The sleep aide wakes up the weary with customizable light settings and soothing sounds—not to mention, will look like total eye candy on her nightstand.Brooklinen Super-Plush Turkish Cotton Bath Towel Bundle5/41Brooklinen Super-Plush Turkish Cotton Bath Towel BundleA new set of fluffy bath towels? Yes please. This 100% Turkish cotton set from one of our favorite bedding and bath brands would pair perfectly with her favorite bath salts and a book from her Goodreads wishlist.UrbanStems The Type A Mom Bouquet6/41UrbanStems The Type A Mom BouquetHow adorable is this bunch from UrbanStems? The sophisticated bouquet features a monochrome rose and carnation mix that any mom would be thrilled to receive.Cozy Earth Bamboo Stretch-Knit Long Sleeve Pajama Set7/41Cozy Earth Bamboo Stretch-Knit Long Sleeve Pajama SetHas anyone been displeased upon receiving a new pajama set? We think not—but just in case, consider that question rhetorical. Cozy Earth knows their way around silky-soft loungewear, and these bamboo stretch long sleeve pj’s built for extended periods of snoozing prove it.Quince 14K Gold Pearl Drop Earrings8/41Quince 14K Gold Pearl Drop EarringsBoth timeless and fashion-forward, these freshwater pearl earrings—accented with 14k gold—make a thoughtful gift for moms of all ages and style sensibilities.Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift Set9/41Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift SetOne of our favorite subscription boxes to give as gifts is this curated coffee collection from Atlas Coffee that lets you sample fresh beans from around the world. This special Mother’s Day edition set combines six single-origin specialty coffees from spots like Peru and Kenya, pairing them with a delicious set of chocolates from AndSons. It also comes with a special card and all the info Mom needs for brewing.Salt & Stone Deluxe Body Duo10/41Salt & Stone Deluxe Body DuoMake her shower self-care a little more indulgent with this body wash and lotion duo from Salt & Stone. She’ll feel especially indulgent using it with an exfoliating Japanese wash cloth that promotes soft, moisturized skin.Bearaby Velvet Napper11/41Bearaby Velvet NapperWeighted blankets have been shown to help people get better, deeper sleep. They calm anxiety and provide a deep pressure that triggers stress-relieving and mood-boosting hormones. This velvety pick is a must-have, not only for the wonderful sleep it will give her, but because it’s got a great feel to it.Flamingo Estate Richard’s Essentials Set12/41Flamingo Estate Richard’s Essentials SetMom deserves the best of everything, which is why this gift box—curated by Flamingo Estate founder Richard Christiansen—is a fail-proof choice, stocked with the finest heritage olive oil, raw honey, freshly roasted coffee, and more.Frette Astoria Slipper13/41Frette Astoria SlipperIf she's fully stocked on indoor loungewear, mom can step into spring with these suede slippers that add an element of casual luxury to her footwear rotation.Eliburch Mini Epitome Pendant14/41Eliburch Mini Epitome PendantCool moms need equally cool jewelry. Get her on the trend train with this dainty sterling silver peridot pendant she can hang off her favorite chain.Binu Binu Incense Discovery Kit15/41Binu Binu Incense Discovery KitWhy give one scent when you can give several? Binu Binu’s high-quality gift set contains ten sticks each of six intoxicating fragrances, including cypress, seascape, and hydrangea tea.Ember Mug Coffee Mug16/41Ember 14 Oz. Mug Coffee MugNo more microwaving the same cup multiple times before the coffee actually gets consumed. This app-controlled vessel heats and keeps beverages warmed to mom’s exact desired temperature, rather than perpetually lukewarm.Anthropologie Dimitria Stoneware Vase17/41Anthropologie Dimitria Stoneware VaseIf she has a green thumb, this springy vase/pitcher duo from Anthropologie will brighten up her windowsill of plain potted foliage.For a cozy morning in18/41The Citizenry Stonewashed Linen Sheet SetGive her an excuse not to leave her bed for three to five business days. A hard feat made easier with these sumptuous linen sheets, which feel soft right out of the box and, as commerce editor Audrey Lee noted, are “super cozy and inviting.”Estelle Colored Glass Stemware (Set of 6)19/41Estelle Colored Glass Stemware (Set of 6)If you’re looking for a unique wine glass set, consider Estelle’s lovely handblown pieces. This particularly pretty set is inspired by the colors of the sunset.Smeg Mini KettleSmeg’s retro-inspired electric kettle features a midcentury-modern design with modern functionality. Whether she likes to start her day with a strong cup of joe or a soothing chamomile, it’ll make a perfect Mother’s day gift.Calpak Packing Cubes (5-Piece Set)21/41Calpak Packing Cubes (5-Piece Set)If you have a jet-setting mama, consider these sleek packing cubes. Not only do they save suitcase space, they keep all your garments organized and neat. This five-piece set is one of Calpak’s bestsellers, and is available in more than ten patterns and colors. Quince European Linen Duvet Cover Set22/41Quince European Linen Duvet Cover SetTreat mom to a fresh duvet cover. The high-quality European linen is perfect for year-round use, and it’s clocking in at a stellar price point.Aura Carver Luxe HD Smart Digital Picture Frame23/41Aura Carver Luxe HD Smart Digital Picture FrameIf the biggest challenge that comes with gifting a photo frame is deciding on a single picture, the Aura is for you—you can have an infinite amount of photos cycle through forever! This app-controlled smart frame lets anyone who is connected upload photos whenever they want. We love the smart technology, crystal clear HD screen, and the contemporary frame design.Hurom Rose Gold Slow Juicer24/41Hurom Rose Gold Slow JuicerThis high-quality juicer has no shortage of rave reviews, and it’s no wonder why. It’s heavy-duty but lightweight, efficient, user-friendly, and designed to be cleaned with ease. In addition to making juice, you can also use it to make sorbet, soy milk, purees, smoothies, and even ice cream.Apple AirTagApple AirTags are handy for keeping track of anything. You can pop these tiny, stainless steel, Bluetooth-powered device locators in your purse or wallet, or attach them to your keys, and you’ll be able to locate them with your phone. No more wasted time searching aimlessly! As an added bonus, you can get them engraved with up to three characters for no additional cost. (And if you really want to go all-out, you can add on a Hermès AirTag cover.)Levain Bakery Signature Cookie Assortment26/41Levain Bakery Signature Cookie AssortmentLevain’s cookie assortment features freshly baked chocolate chip walnut, dark chocolate chip, dark chocolate peanut butter chip, and oatmeal raisin cookies. You can get a set of 4, 8, or 12—we’d go for 12 and make mom share. Mimi La Rouleuse Arcüs Concrete Tray27/41Mimi La Rouleuse Arcüs Concrete TrayThese handmade concrete trays are chic, contemporary, and versatile. They work equally well as serving boards, jewelry trays, or shelf decor. iRobot Roomba 692 Robot Vacuum28/41iRobot Roomba 692 Robot VacuumOnce you’ve tried a robo vac, you’ll never want to go back to regular vacuuming (and we should know: we’ve tried all the best robo vacuums). If you already have one, you know how awesome they are. Treat mom to one, too! She can spend her time doing literally anything else while this futuristic, app-controlled gadget gets up the crumbs, dust, and debris from carpet, hardwood, laminate, and tile flooring. Great Jones Dutch Baby29/41Great Jones Dutch BabyThis cast iron Dutch oven is the perfect size for 1-2 people, and adds a pop of welcome color to any stovetop. Mom can use it to make her famous slow-cooked ragu, seasonal soups, or crusty sourdough bread.Best of Saje Diffuser Blend Collection30/41Best of Saje Diffuser Blend CollectionA gift set of essential oils is a great gift on its own, or as an add-on to a diffuser. This set from Saje features four popular blends for the home, which include citrusy, woodsy, and minty aromas.Oui the People Featherweight Hydrating Body Gloss Oil31/41OUI the People Featherweight Hydrating Body Gloss Oil with SqualaneSkin care at its finest: This seriously sensual body serum from Oui the People delivers hydration and will give her a few moments post-bath to love on herself. The new Cedarwood scent is musky, woodsy, and just floral enough.Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer32/41Dyson Supersonic Hair DryerThis isn’t your average hair dryer. It’s a tech-savvy pick that dries hair ridiculously fast, while also protecting against heat damage. The result is super-shiny, super-smooth, super-healthy hair. Granted, this is definitely a splurge, so consider going in on it with your siblings. Seen here in silver, the Supersonic Hair Dryer is also available in fuchsia, copper, and silver)Yeti Rambler Wine Tumbler33/41Yeti Rambler Wine TumblerThis durable wine tumbler is great to have on hand for picnic lunches, beach days, and afternoons out by the pool. It’s available in six pretty shades, and can be customized with a monogram, name, or message. Grovemade Wood Laptop Stand34/41Grovemade Wood Laptop StandThis elevated laptop stand will be a welcome addition to your mother’s home office. The stand is made with wood, and features a steel and leather top surface.Mother & Child Assouline Coffee Table Book35/41Mother & Child Assouline Coffee Table BookFor the mom who can’t resist a good read, this head-turning tome boasts nearly 300 pages of photographs and interviews on the experience of modern mothering. Featured names include Carolina Herrera, Aerin Lauder, Patti Hansen, and more.HAY Sobremesa Jug by Laila Gohar36/41Sobremesa Jug by Laila Gohar for HayIs there anything Mom loves more than a multifunctional object? (Besides you, of course.) This jug could be a vessel for her finest big-batch sangria, a centerpiece topped with dried florals for the dining room table, a kitchen utensil holder, or simply a gorgeous objet d’art.Nekteck Shiatsu Foot Massager Machine37/41Nekteck Shiatsu Foot Massager MachineEase her tired soles with this heated foot massager, which she can prop up while she watches Netflix or cracks open a new book.Golden Rabbit Enamel Mixing Bowls Set of 338/41Golden Rabbit Enamel Mixing Bowls (Set of 3)Who doesn’t love a fresh set of stacking bowls with lids? This high-quality trio (made of porcelain-coated steel) is ultra durable and will remind her of a Jackson Pollack painting.Bey-Berk Leather Jewelry Box39/41Bey-Berk Leather Jewelry BoxHere’s a handsome, spacious jewelry box for the mom with an enviable accessory collection. It has both removable and hidden components to keep her heirloom gems safe, plus plenty of nooks and crannies for rings, stud earrings, and watches.Manduka The Pro Yoga Mat40/41Manduka The Pro Yoga MatMaybe her yoga mat has seen better days or she’s always renting one at the studio. Manduka’s Pro yoga mat is thick for kneeling postures and achy joints and grippy enough for heated flows.Ossa Martini and Pearl Wristlet Phone Strap41/41Ossa Martini and Pearl Wristlet Phone StrapMoms lose their phones, it’s a fact; this makes an Ossa phone case chain a practical (and trendy gift). This one is made with pearl and crystal glass beads that remind us of martini happy hour. Just watch the compliments start flowing.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

The best gifts for moms all have one thing in common: The thought behind them. Whether the present you land on is a piece of jewelry, a sweet treat, or a household essential that she’ll use day in and day out, the main thing is to pick something that speaks to what you know and love about her. Maybe the resident baker-in-chief could use a new recipe stand for pouring over ingredients or the hardcore yogi could use a new mat. Dig deep in the memory bank and you’ll undoubtedly think up something great, but if you’re looking for a little immediate inspiration, we’ve got you covered. And while you still have time to prep for Mother’s Day, we’d suggest not waiting until the very last minute to go in with the sibling group chat on something nice (a word of advice your always-prepared mom would pass on, too).

On that note, we’ve rounded up the best Mother's Day gifts for all the mother figures out there, including designer bouquets, quirky home goods, DIY moments, wellness must-haves for an at-home day of pampering, and more. Read on for our best gifts for moms.

Our Top Picks:

  • For The Art-Loving Cook: Brightland Paint & Pour Gift Set, $95
  • For The Stylish Plant Mom: The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee Meintjes, $20
  • For The Sleepmaxxer: Sijo Eucalyptus Comforter, $235 $200
  • For The Gadget-Lover: Hatch Restore 3, $170
  • For The Spa Enthusiast: Brooklinen Super-Plush Bath Towel Bundle, $150
  • For The Caffeine Aficionado: Atlas Coffee Club Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift Set, $120 $99

  • Brightland Paint & Pour Gift Set

    1/41

    Brightland Paint & Pour Gift Set

    No gift guide for moms would be complete without a few cooking essentials. This set puts a fun spin on Brightland’s coveted extra virgin olive oil with a paint kit that lets you customize your own labels. We suggest making a night out of it, complete with some wine and your favorite sourdough to pair with the olive oil.

  • The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee Meintjes

    2/41

    The Domesticated Jungle Poster by Lara Lee Meintjes

    Pairing this beautiful print from artist Laura Le Meintjes with a stunning bouquet is the ultimate gift idea for moms who love florals. And while the real florals won’t last, she’ll be able to admire the artwork for years to come.

  • Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus Comforter

    3/41

    Sijo AiryWeight Eucalyptus Comforter

    Finally, a comforter for hot sleepers that truly checks every box: Lightly weighted but breathable, warm but moisture-wicking. Though, if mom prefers a light through, SIJO’s lighter throw blanket is sustainably made from the same 100% Tencel lyocell.

  • Hatch Restore 3

    Gift mom her best sleep yet with the Hatch Restore 3 (you’ll remember the Hatch Restore 2 snagged a spot in our 2024 Sleep Awards). The sleep aide wakes up the weary with customizable light settings and soothing sounds—not to mention, will look like total eye candy on her nightstand.

  • Brooklinen Super-Plush Turkish Cotton Bath Towel Bundle

    5/41

    Brooklinen Super-Plush Turkish Cotton Bath Towel Bundle

    A new set of fluffy bath towels? Yes please. This 100% Turkish cotton set from one of our favorite bedding and bath brands would pair perfectly with her favorite bath salts and a book from her Goodreads wishlist.

  • UrbanStems The Type A Mom Bouquet

    6/41

    UrbanStems The Type A Mom Bouquet

    How adorable is this bunch from UrbanStems? The sophisticated bouquet features a monochrome rose and carnation mix that any mom would be thrilled to receive.

  • Cozy Earth Bamboo Stretch-Knit Long Sleeve Pajama Set

    7/41

    Cozy Earth Bamboo Stretch-Knit Long Sleeve Pajama Set

    Has anyone been displeased upon receiving a new pajama set? We think not—but just in case, consider that question rhetorical. Cozy Earth knows their way around silky-soft loungewear, and these bamboo stretch long sleeve pj’s built for extended periods of snoozing prove it.

  • Quince 14K Gold Pearl Drop Earrings

    8/41

    Quince 14K Gold Pearl Drop Earrings

    Both timeless and fashion-forward, these freshwater pearl earrings—accented with 14k gold—make a thoughtful gift for moms of all ages and style sensibilities.

  • Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift Set

    9/41

    Mother's Day Coffee & Tea Gift Set

    One of our favorite subscription boxes to give as gifts is this curated coffee collection from Atlas Coffee that lets you sample fresh beans from around the world. This special Mother’s Day edition set combines six single-origin specialty coffees from spots like Peru and Kenya, pairing them with a delicious set of chocolates from AndSons. It also comes with a special card and all the info Mom needs for brewing.

  • Salt & Stone Deluxe Body Duo

    10/41

    Salt & Stone Deluxe Body Duo

    Make her shower self-care a little more indulgent with this body wash and lotion duo from Salt & Stone. She’ll feel especially indulgent using it with an exfoliating Japanese wash cloth that promotes soft, moisturized skin.

  • Bearaby Velvet Napper

    11/41

    Bearaby Velvet Napper

    Weighted blankets have been shown to help people get better, deeper sleep. They calm anxiety and provide a deep pressure that triggers stress-relieving and mood-boosting hormones. This velvety pick is a must-have, not only for the wonderful sleep it will give her, but because it’s got a great feel to it.

  • Flamingo Estate Richard’s Essentials Set

    12/41

    Flamingo Estate Richard’s Essentials Set

    Mom deserves the best of everything, which is why this gift box—curated by Flamingo Estate founder Richard Christiansen—is a fail-proof choice, stocked with the finest heritage olive oil, raw honey, freshly roasted coffee, and more.

  • Frette Astoria Slipper

    13/41

    Frette Astoria Slipper

    If she's fully stocked on indoor loungewear, mom can step into spring with these suede slippers that add an element of casual luxury to her footwear rotation.

  • Eliburch Mini Epitome Pendant

    14/41

    Eliburch Mini Epitome Pendant

    Cool moms need equally cool jewelry. Get her on the trend train with this dainty sterling silver peridot pendant she can hang off her favorite chain.

  • Binu Binu Incense Discovery Kit

    15/41

    Binu Binu Incense Discovery Kit

    Why give one scent when you can give several? Binu Binu’s high-quality gift set contains ten sticks each of six intoxicating fragrances, including cypress, seascape, and hydrangea tea.

  • Ember Mug Coffee Mug

    16/41

    Ember 14 Oz. Mug Coffee Mug

    No more microwaving the same cup multiple times before the coffee actually gets consumed. This app-controlled vessel heats and keeps beverages warmed to mom’s exact desired temperature, rather than perpetually lukewarm.

  • Anthropologie Dimitria Stoneware Vase

    17/41

    Anthropologie Dimitria Stoneware Vase

    If she has a green thumb, this springy vase/pitcher duo from Anthropologie will brighten up her windowsill of plain potted foliage.

  • For a cozy morning in

    18/41

    The Citizenry Stonewashed Linen Sheet Set

    Give her an excuse not to leave her bed for three to five business days. A hard feat made easier with these sumptuous linen sheets, which feel soft right out of the box and, as commerce editor Audrey Lee noted, are “super cozy and inviting.”

  • Estelle Colored Glass Stemware (Set of 6)

    19/41

    Estelle Colored Glass Stemware (Set of 6)

    If you’re looking for a unique wine glass set, consider Estelle’s lovely handblown pieces. This particularly pretty set is inspired by the colors of the sunset.

  • Smeg Mini Kettle

    Smeg’s retro-inspired electric kettle features a midcentury-modern design with modern functionality. Whether she likes to start her day with a strong cup of joe or a soothing chamomile, it’ll make a perfect Mother’s day gift.

  • Calpak Packing Cubes (5-Piece Set)

    21/41

    Calpak Packing Cubes (5-Piece Set)

    If you have a jet-setting mama, consider these sleek packing cubes. Not only do they save suitcase space, they keep all your garments organized and neat. This five-piece set is one of Calpak’s bestsellers, and is available in more than ten patterns and colors. 

  • Quince European Linen Duvet Cover Set

    22/41

    Quince European Linen Duvet Cover Set

    Treat mom to a fresh duvet cover. The high-quality European linen is perfect for year-round use, and it’s clocking in at a stellar price point.

  • Aura Carver Luxe HD Smart Digital Picture Frame

    23/41

    Aura Carver Luxe HD Smart Digital Picture Frame

    If the biggest challenge that comes with gifting a photo frame is deciding on a single picture, the Aura is for you—you can have an infinite amount of photos cycle through forever! This app-controlled smart frame lets anyone who is connected upload photos whenever they want. We love the smart technology, crystal clear HD screen, and the contemporary frame design.

  • Hurom Rose Gold Slow Juicer

    24/41

    Hurom Rose Gold Slow Juicer

    This high-quality juicer has no shortage of rave reviews, and it’s no wonder why. It’s heavy-duty but lightweight, efficient, user-friendly, and designed to be cleaned with ease. In addition to making juice, you can also use it to make sorbet, soy milk, purees, smoothies, and even ice cream.

  • Apple AirTag

    Apple AirTags are handy for keeping track of anything. You can pop these tiny, stainless steel, Bluetooth-powered device locators in your purse or wallet, or attach them to your keys, and you’ll be able to locate them with your phone. No more wasted time searching aimlessly! As an added bonus, you can get them engraved with up to three characters for no additional cost. (And if you really want to go all-out, you can add on a Hermès AirTag cover.)

  • Levain Bakery Signature Cookie Assortment

    26/41

    Levain Bakery Signature Cookie Assortment

    Levain’s cookie assortment features freshly baked chocolate chip walnut, dark chocolate chip, dark chocolate peanut butter chip, and oatmeal raisin cookies. You can get a set of 4, 8, or 12—we’d go for 12 and make mom share. 

  • Mimi La Rouleuse Arcüs Concrete Tray

    27/41

    Mimi La Rouleuse Arcüs Concrete Tray

    These handmade concrete trays are chic, contemporary, and versatile. They work equally well as serving boards, jewelry trays, or shelf decor. 

  • iRobot Roomba 692 Robot Vacuum

    28/41

    iRobot Roomba 692 Robot Vacuum

    Once you’ve tried a robo vac, you’ll never want to go back to regular vacuuming (and we should know: we’ve tried all the best robo vacuums). If you already have one, you know how awesome they are. Treat mom to one, too! She can spend her time doing literally anything else while this futuristic, app-controlled gadget gets up the crumbs, dust, and debris from carpet, hardwood, laminate, and tile flooring. 

  • Great Jones Dutch Baby

    29/41

    Great Jones Dutch Baby

    This cast iron Dutch oven is the perfect size for 1-2 people, and adds a pop of welcome color to any stovetop. Mom can use it to make her famous slow-cooked ragu, seasonal soups, or crusty sourdough bread.

  • Best of Saje Diffuser Blend Collection

    30/41

    Best of Saje Diffuser Blend Collection

    A gift set of essential oils is a great gift on its own, or as an add-on to a diffuser. This set from Saje features four popular blends for the home, which include citrusy, woodsy, and minty aromas.

  • Oui the People Featherweight Hydrating Body Gloss Oil

    31/41

    OUI the People Featherweight Hydrating Body Gloss Oil with Squalane

    Skin care at its finest: This seriously sensual body serum from Oui the People delivers hydration and will give her a few moments post-bath to love on herself. The new Cedarwood scent is musky, woodsy, and just floral enough.

  • Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer

    32/41

    Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer

    This isn’t your average hair dryer. It’s a tech-savvy pick that dries hair ridiculously fast, while also protecting against heat damage. The result is super-shiny, super-smooth, super-healthy hair. Granted, this is definitely a splurge, so consider going in on it with your siblings. Seen here in silver, the Supersonic Hair Dryer is also available in fuchsia, copper, and silver)

  • Yeti Rambler Wine Tumbler

    33/41

    Yeti Rambler Wine Tumbler

    This durable wine tumbler is great to have on hand for picnic lunches, beach days, and afternoons out by the pool. It’s available in six pretty shades, and can be customized with a monogram, name, or message. 

  • Grovemade Wood Laptop Stand

    34/41

    Grovemade Wood Laptop Stand

    This elevated laptop stand will be a welcome addition to your mother’s home office. The stand is made with wood, and features a steel and leather top surface.

  • Mother & Child Assouline Coffee Table Book

    35/41

    Mother & Child Assouline Coffee Table Book

    For the mom who can’t resist a good read, this head-turning tome boasts nearly 300 pages of photographs and interviews on the experience of modern mothering. Featured names include Carolina Herrera, Aerin Lauder, Patti Hansen, and more.

  • HAY Sobremesa Jug by Laila Gohar

    36/41

    Sobremesa Jug by Laila Gohar for Hay

    Is there anything Mom loves more than a multifunctional object? (Besides you, of course.) This jug could be a vessel for her finest big-batch sangria, a centerpiece topped with dried florals for the dining room table, a kitchen utensil holder, or simply a gorgeous objet d’art.

  • Nekteck Shiatsu Foot Massager Machine

    37/41

    Nekteck Shiatsu Foot Massager Machine

    Ease her tired soles with this heated foot massager, which she can prop up while she watches Netflix or cracks open a new book.

  • Golden Rabbit Enamel Mixing Bowls Set of 3

    38/41

    Golden Rabbit Enamel Mixing Bowls (Set of 3)

    Who doesn’t love a fresh set of stacking bowls with lids? This high-quality trio (made of porcelain-coated steel) is ultra durable and will remind her of a Jackson Pollack painting.

  • Bey-Berk Leather Jewelry Box

    39/41

    Bey-Berk Leather Jewelry Box

    Here’s a handsome, spacious jewelry box for the mom with an enviable accessory collection. It has both removable and hidden components to keep her heirloom gems safe, plus plenty of nooks and crannies for rings, stud earrings, and watches.

  • Manduka The Pro Yoga Mat

    40/41

    Manduka The Pro Yoga Mat

    Maybe her yoga mat has seen better days or she’s always renting one at the studio. Manduka’s Pro yoga mat is thick for kneeling postures and achy joints and grippy enough for heated flows.

  • Ossa Martini and Pearl Wristlet Phone Strap

    41/41

    Ossa Martini and Pearl Wristlet Phone Strap

    Moms lose their phones, it’s a fact; this makes an Ossa phone case chain a practical (and trendy gift). This one is made with pearl and crystal glass beads that remind us of martini happy hour. Just watch the compliments start flowing.
